body.p:
70
Feby 15th 5
Ernest B. Lambert Esq
Tullahoma. Tenn.
Sir

Your communication of the 10th inst to his Excellency Gov Bramlette, has been referred to this office. I referred your application to the War Dept with an Endorsement, that you be authorized to recruit for the Battery, which Elicited the reply, copy herein inclosed. This reply was duely forwarded to you on the 29th of Decr, at Nashville Tenn.

Very Respectfully
D, W, Lindsey
Inspt & Adj Genl Ky
